# thetalake_case (Resource)

Theta Lake Case Resource. Manages a case in Theta Lake.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "thetalake_case" "example" {
  name        = "Example Case"
  number      = "CASE-001"
  visibility  = "PRIVATE"
  description = "An example case for investigation"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Case Name
- `number` (String) Case Number

### Optional

- `description` (String) Case Description
- `visibility` (String) Case Visibility (e.g., PRIVATE, PUBLIC)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Case ID
- `open_date` (String) Date the case was opened
